name: 8, 16, 32 bit Binary detection
description:
This RegEx matches 8, 16 & 32 bit binary pattern with or without any starting sting.
This uses '\b' to match the actual pattern but not any continuation.
Again the '|' matches either 8bit or 16 bit or 32 bit binary pattern
content:
This is a 8 bit binary pattern 11001110

This is a 16 bit binary pattern 1010100011100111

This is a 32 bit binary pattern 10101000111001111010100011100111

This is not a binary pattern 1010100011100119

This matches without any string at the begining
0000111100001110
author: Mayukh Sarkar
